title: Welcome to Your Journey
description1: Hey {{name}}, you're here because <0>your inner wisdom</0> whispered there's a different path, and you had the courage to listen.
description2: This month, think of it like visiting a new country where <0>you get to meet yourself</0> with fresh eyes. We'll give you our best and we are not going to leave you alone.
description3: Take this seriously for one month like your life <0>depends on it</0>. Because it just might.
description4: <0>You're not broken.</0> You're here to remember who you really are and take back your power to choose.
description5: Welcome to Unconscious Moderation. <0>You're exactly where you need to be.</0>

medicalStatement.title: Medical Statement
medicalStatement.text:
This app is designed for informational and educational purposes only and should not be considered medical advice. It does not diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any medical condition. Always consult a qualified healthcare professional before making any health-related decisions or starting any new treatment. If you experience a medical emergency, seek immediate medical attention or call emergency services.

By using this app, you acknowledge and agree that the information provided is not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment.
